speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: All right! It was kind of a dry spell there lately, but now that it’s entering the holiday season, we’re going to be having a lot more orders. So get ready!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: First, we have some requests for some anniversary cards. I’ll put them on your desk.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Ahhh, I remember when Alma and I first met… it was around the fall like this, too.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: We worked together at a bubblegum research lab. She was the elasticity tester, and I was the package design…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: She kept shooting looks over at me, and I thought she was angry with me.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: So I walked up to her and I asked her, “Do you have a problem with me?!”

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: She kissed me on the nose! Can you believe that?

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: One night, when no one was at the factory, we snuck in and…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: STOLE THE BUBBLEGUM RIGHT OUT OF THE BUBBLEGUM MAKER!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Oooh, I can’t believe she made me do that! It was so secretive, so naughty…
